resources.string: Select the two .json files required for setup. You can access these files via console.firebase.google.com. Create a new Firebase project if you don\'t have one. Please read the documentation for a more detailed explanation.

Open the project settings at section \"General\". Click \"Add App\" and select the Android icon. Type \"de.tebbeubben.remora\" in the \"Package name\" field. Click \"Register app\" and download the google-service.json in the next step.
Open the project settings at section \"Service accounts\". Choose \"Firebase Admin SDK\" if not already selected. Click \"Generate new private key\".
The provided .json configuration files are from two different Firebase projects, which is not allowed.
This is not a valid configuration file: %1$s
An error occurred while loading the file: %1$s
